hero-content.title: About SIDF
hero-content.body: The Saudi Industrial Development Fund (SIDF) was established in 1974 (1394H) with an initial capital of 500 million SAR. It is one of the key pillars of achieving sustainable industrial development in the Kingdom. SIDF provides financial and advisory solutions to support the growth and development of the industrial sector, and its role has expanded to include promising sectors such as energy, mining, and logistics, making it the primary financial enabler for achieving Vision 2030 goals.

hero-content.title: Board of Directors
hero-content.body: SIDF’s Board of Directors comprises elite leaders and experts from various key sectors across the Kingdom. The Board is responsible for setting public policies and defining SIDF’s strategic direction. It ensures sound governance and supervises the Fund’s performance to efficiently and effectively achieve its objectives in line with national industrial development aspirations.

hero-content.title: Organizational Structure
hero-content.body: SIDF adopts a flexible organizational structure that supports swift decision-making and enhances performance efficiency. The structure includes specialized departments in finance, business development, strategic planning, and support services, ensuring effective coordination between units for optimal results. This framework also enables the adoption of modern methodologies that enhance the beneficiary experience.

stats.body: Updated to align with Vision goals

hero-content.title: Message from the Chairman
hero-content.body: We at the SIDF Board of Directors take pride in the Fund’s pivotal role in supporting the national economy and stimulating industrial investments. We are fully committed to embedding sustainability and innovation within the industrial sector and advancing toward realizing the leadership’s aspirations for building a diverse and prosperous economy.

hero-content.title: Message from the CEO
hero-content.body: At SIDF, we aim to provide an integrated financing experience that empowers industrial investors and adds value to the national economy. We believe in the importance of partnership with the private sector and are continuously developing our services and products to align with the objectives of Vision 2030, with a firm commitment to excellence and efficiency.

our-goals.title: Our Strategic Goals
our-goals.body: The Industrial Development Fund works effectively to provide financial and advisory support and offer innovative solutions to grow and develop local industry and improve its performance, in order to achieve the following goals:

goals.body: Enhance the efficiency and performance of enterprises and achieve sustainability
Foster integration between the industrial sector and other sectors
Increase the participation of Saudi talents in the industrial sector
Optimize the use of local raw materials
Attract foreign investment and localize technology
Promote a culture of industrial safety and risk prevention in industrial facilities
Raise environmental awareness in the industrial sector

about-content.title: Vision
about-content.body: An industrial development fund that empowers Saudi Arabia’s transformation into a leading industrial power and a global logistics hub.

about-content.title: Mission
about-content.body: Enhancing the competitiveness of the ecosystem and improving investment attractiveness by offering financial and non-financial products and services.

data.title: Client Success
data.body: We support the success of our clients, as their success is our own.

data.title: Empowerment
data.body: We strive to empower others so we can work together and achieve results efficiently.

data.title: Collaboration
data.body: We support the success of our clients, as their success is our own.

data.title: Development
data.body: Development is at the heart of our work and the driver behind everything we do.

data.title: Reliability
data.body: We can be relied upon in any task entrusted to us, and in the decisions we make.
